channel.title: Mod suggestion for the coffee cup and inhalers
channel.description:
I would love a mod that puts inhalers in the coffee cup (like how you can put ammo in a gun) and any time you take a sip from the coffee you use an inhaler. I don't know where to even start with modding sadly. Does anyone who knows how to do this have any interest in teaching me or making this mod?
Thanks
